meanings.definition: A ball used in the sport of baseball.
meanings.sent1: The coach handed out new baseballs for practice.
meanings.sent2: The kids played catch with the baseballs in the park.
meanings.sent3: The baseballs decided to have a game of their own when the players left.
meanings.sent4: The baseballs rolled off the shelf like a herd of tiny round animals.
meanings.sent5: The bright red baseballs gleamed under the stadium lights.

meanings.sent1: She collected autographed baseballs from famous players.
meanings.sent2: The team won three baseballs as trophies for their victory.
meanings.sent3: The baseballs on the shelf looked like a colorful display of orbs.
meanings.sent4: The baseballs in the bag rattled like a pocketful of memories.
meanings.sent5: The shiny baseballs reflected the sunlight in all directions.
